thread.section_title: LOLA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LOLA | mylola.com | 2 of 11
thread.title: Chrissy_ag

author: Chrissy_ag
title: Chrissy_ag
text: I figured it was worth a shot. I used to be a loyal Kotex Natural Balance user but they discontinued their 'natural' line and i was forced to start trying to find other brands who were not chemical laden and still worked. I saw an ad for LOLA but always thought they were tampon only. To my surprise they had pads at a decent enough price and I gave them a shot. I am so happy that I did and will now be a lolay LOLA purchaser from here on out. I love their auto delivery plan and that you can customize the boxes to your needs. First month down and no nasty rash so I put this brand in the win category. Thank you LOLA for making a product I can wear and trust.
